_header: Saint Eadburh the holy maid was here of England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Eadburh, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Eadburh in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
seint edborwȝ þe holy mayde was her of ingelondking
                    edward here fadir was as I ondirstond…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now bidde we seint edborw þat þus brouȝt here lyf
                    to endeþat we moot forþ wit here to þe ioy of heuin
                    wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Adboruh þat holi Maide was here of EngelondeÞe kyng
                    Edward hire fader was as ich vndurstonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝeorne seint Adborwh þat þus
                    brouȝte hire lyf to endeÞat we mote forþ wiþ hire to
                    þe Ioye of heuene wende. A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Eadborw þat holi maide was here of engelondeÞe king edward hire fader was as ich vnderstonde…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now bidde we ȝerne seint edborw þat þo brouȝte hire lif to endeÞat we mote vorþ wiþ hire to þe ioie of heuene wende
